title: Your Wallet: Where you fall on the economic ladder

contentencoded:
On last week's show, we asked you to tell us your stories about how you get where you are. We're talking about economic class.

What happens when you fall a few rungs?

Many of you answered. We took your answers to CBC News Business Analyst  Jill Schlesinger to give advice on climbing up the economic ladder.
description: How did you get where you are?
